posts.post_content: Sure, this costs more than [Diamond Valley](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diamond Valley), but just how often are you going to use the ability, anyway? Once, maybe twice a game? The mana this gives you on the turns you're not sacrificing anything is probably enough to make up for the ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol) you spend to activate the sacrifice ability.

posts.post_content:
it also has another advantage of costing about 65-70 dollars less. xD  
  
Nonetheless, I would rather run [Phyrexian tower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian tower), [City of Shadows](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=City of Shadows) or [High Market](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Market) for a free sack outlet, life it irrelevant until you are dead and those can save quite a bit or in some cases add quite a bit of mana.

posts.post_content: Not bad, but I much prefer [High Market](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Market). [Diamond Valley](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diamond Valley) can't tap for mana, and Miren is too expensive to activate. The Market got it just right, as it can kill your creatures efficiently, and the life you miss out on hardly matters.
